thread.title: Very solid, for business or pleasure. Can't go wrong.
thread.title_full: Very solid, for business or pleasure. Can't go wrong. - Review of Hyatt Regency San Francisco Airport - Burlingame, Burlingame, CA - TripAdvisor

author: daniellQ2016LK
title: Very solid, for business or pleasure. Can't go wrong.
text: The Hyatt Regency at the SFO Airport is a consistent, solid hotel that has great rooms, excellent food and great service! You simply cannot go wrong staying here and the courtesy shuttle is consistently making rounds all day and night.
